info.name: Firefox macOS Sierra
info.description: Safari-like style for Firefox 46+ on Mac OS X Important The theme doesn't display properly with Stylish. Try it using the userChrome.css file instead.
info.additionalInfo: Based on devegadev style (https://userstyles.org/styles/119600/firefox-os-x-el-capitan), but fixed for new Firefox versions and have inline images. Made for Mac OS X! Not tested and can have glitches on Retina Macs! Changelog: Version 1.8 ----------- Fix tab images for Firefox 53+ Version 1.7 ----------- Adopted layout for Firefox 46+ Added tabs loading spinner Fixed pinned tab close overflow Added url / search bar text left alignment on focus Added url / search bar macOS-like focus Inline base64 encoded images Dirty fix for private browsing button (hided for now) Disabled info images background in url bar Base64 images size optimization Disabled url-bar on popup windows Install ------- 1. Go to about:config and change browser.tabs.animate value to false (avoid blank spaces after closing tabs) 2. Go to Help -> Trobleshooting page and open Firefox User Profile folder Just put this css to userChrome.css in chrome folder inside Firefox User Profile directory and restart browser.
